title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf

If you choose option 1, Astarion will want you to tell him Raphael's location.

Let's share our experiences about Raphael. Perhaps we can help each other. Raphael could be anywhere. But let me go, and I'll free you from his grasp. I've got nothing to spit out- not for you, anyway. Attack.

If you choose option one, he will bring up his contract. This will give you an additional quest: Break Yurgir's Contract. You can choose to complete this quest o
